name: SmallVille Guardian
description:
VR Game developed for the VR Jam 2021

Theme : Small World

My game is inspired by Age of Empire and Deisim.

You are a God like guardian and can use resources to build houses and defend the village with fireball against zombis.

Building a house cost 10 woods that will be gathered from villagers. Each houses make a new villager.

Zombis will come by waves, stop them from killing villagers.

This game is available on PCVR (Test on Index) and Quest (Test on 1 & 2)

Credits : 

Developer :

  •  SkyCobra

Assets used :

  • Fantasy Wooden GUI  Free -> Menu UI
  • Supercyan Free Forest Sample -> Environnement
  • Unity Particles-> FX
  • Mixamo -> Characters & Animations

No sounds sadly, no time :(
